title: Vitrification card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Vitrification card turns rock and stone walls transparent, allowing visibility through them. It affects a radius around the player that depends on power level: *At power level 0 or 1, 1d(Power/40) + 1 tiles around the player are vitrified. *At power level 2, it vitrifies the entire level.
